Articles.Content:
Hi guys and girls, just wanted to let you know I exist, and while I am still new to the game, am enjoying it so much, that it may/may not have started to compromise my schoolwork. Ah well, this game basically gives you a degree is astrophysics... right?

Anyway, hopefully you can find it in your hearts to put up with me, I will see you all soon.

Don't go dying now.

Welcome to the forums miro . I seem to remember acquiring very little sleep after purchasing the game.

Happy Launchings,

Rich
